summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1872, for the improvement of Fourteenth Avenue, in the City of Seattle, from East Cherry Street to East Union Street, by constructing concrete walks thereon, with all necessary appurtenances, under Ordinance No. 19518, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
